title: When selecting an XML file, the application should support relative paths
description: When selecting an XML file, the application should support relative paths.
OB: Currently, when selecting an XML file, only the absolute path is supported.
EB: The application should be enhanced to support both relative and absolute paths when selecting an XML file.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the application and navigate to the report creation section.
2. Select an XML file and observe that only the absolute path is accepted.

Expected behavior:
The application should accept both relative and absolute paths when selecting an XML file.
